Uses of Class
com.dougnoel.sentinel.exceptions.SentinelException

Packages that use SentinelException
Package Description
com.dougnoel.sentinel.exceptions
Package to store all of our custom exceptions.
com.dougnoel.sentinel.steps
Generic step definitions.

  • Uses of SentinelException in com.dougnoel.sentinel.exceptions

    Subclasses of SentinelException in com.dougnoel.sentinel.exceptions
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  AccessDeniedException  
    class  ConfigurationMappingException  
    class  ConfigurationNotFoundException
    Exception thrown if a configuration value cannot be found in the configuration file or on the command line.
    class  ConfigurationParseException  
    class  ElementNotFoundException
    Thrown when an element is not found.
    class  ElementNotVisibleException
    Thrown when an element is not currently visible on a web page when the automation is attempting to interact with it.
    class  ElementTypeMismatchException
    Thrown if an Element is accessed as a type other than it is.
    class  FileNotFoundException
    Allows us to pass in the stack trace and additional text to a FileNotFoundException
    class  IOException
    Allows us to pass in the stack trace and additional text to a IOException.
    class  MalformedSelectorException
    Thrown when a selector locator string does not exist.
    class  MalformedURLException
    Allows us to pass in the stack trace and additional text to a MalformedURLException.
    class  NoSuchActionException
    Thrown when an attempt is made to instantiate an Action object that is not defined for the given API object.
    class  NoSuchColumnException
    Thrown when a column requested in a table doesn't exist.
    class  NoSuchElementException
    Thrown if an Element does not exist on a webpage.
    class  NoSuchFrameException
    SentinelException to handle a caught selenium NoSuchFrameException
    class  NoSuchSelectorException
    Thrown when a selector type does not exist.
    class  NoSuchWindowException
    SentinelException to handle a caught Selenium NoSuchWindowException
    class  PageNotFoundException
    SentinelException to catch error thrown if a Page Object is not found or some operation to get a Page fails
    class  PageObjectNotFoundException  
    class  URLNotFoundException
    SentinelException to catch error thrown if a URL is not found or some operation to get a URL fails
    class  WebDriverException
    Sentinel Exception to handle errors thrown when instantiating the WebDriverFactory

  • Uses of SentinelException in com.dougnoel.sentinel.steps

    Methods in com.dougnoel.sentinel.steps that throw SentinelException
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static void SelectSteps.selectItemFromElement​(java.lang.String text, java.lang.String elementName)
    Selects the given option in the select element, then stores the selected value in the Configuration Manager using the element name as the key.
    static void SelectSteps.selectOrdinalItemFromElement​(java.lang.String ordinal, java.lang.String elementName)
    Selects the ordinal option on the element and then stores the text value of that selection in the Configuration Manager using the element name as the key.
